header_text: Hanging out without you: Write Some Thoughts

elements.text:
You are at work and hear some of your coworkers having a conversation behind you. As you listen, you realize that you were not invited to a small gathering, and a few of your coworkers and friends were all hanging out without you. 

Please take 30 seconds to write different thoughts. The next button will appear automatically. 

Thoughts in the moment:
